title: Winged world
creator_credit: Leo Seltzer and United Nations. Film Board
brief_description: Deals with the work of the International Civil Aviation organization whose function is to assist civil aviation in many countries by encouraging the use of safety measures, uniform regulation and simper procedures at national frontiers.
